biotools.summary: ORGANISMS is a weekly updated web resource that facilitates taxonomy-aware search and retrieval of articles. To this end, the the resource performs named entity recognition of terms from the NCBI Taxonomy on PubMed abstracts. The resource further provides download files of organism-disease and organism-tissue associations extracted through automatic text mining.
